scripts.dev:full: vite build && wrangler pages dev dist --d1=DB
scripts.migrate:local: wrangler d1 execute golf-db --local --file=migrations/0001_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute golf-db --local --file=migrations/0002_seed.sql
scripts.migrate:remote: wrangler d1 execute golf-db --remote --file=migrations/0001_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute golf-db --remote --file=migrations/0002_seed.sql
scripts.deploy: vite build && wrangler pages deploy dist
